nodes.text: A line corps was a formation of the Imperial Army.

A line corps was comprised of three line battlegroups, a reinforced battlegroup, an auxiliary battlegroup, and corps headquarters. It included 69,199 personnel, 2,599 repulsorcraft, and 371 heavy tanks.
Line corps could be augmented by the addition of another two line battlegroups, a mobile battlegroup, and an armored battlegroup.
